label: Romero Nápoles, Jesús.  2018. A new species of the seed beetle genus Megacerus Fåhraeus, 1839 (Coleoptera: Bruchidae) and redescription of Megacerus centralis (Pic), with a key to the Mexican species and new host and distribution records. Coleopterists bulletin 72(3): 531–540.
